import { useState } from "react"; import quizData from "../assets/quizData.json" const Question = () => { let [index, setIndex] = useState(0); let[question, setQuestion] = useState(quizData[index]); const submtAnswer = () => { setIndex(quizData(++index)) setQuestion(quizData[index]) } return ( <>

Question {index+1} of {question.subject.length}

{question.questions[0].question}

A

{question.questions[0].options[0]}

B

{question.questions[0].options[1]}

A

{question.questions[0].options[2]}

A

{question.questions[0].options[3]}

) } export default Question;
